mapper.select: /* ProductionProdMapper.getProdDtlList */ SELECT kind , prod_nm , LISTAGG(prod_dtl_nm,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY kind, prod_nm) AS prod_dtl_nm FROM HANADMIN.PRDT_INFO GROUP BY kind, prod_nm

/* ProductionProdMapper.selectPrdtProdList */ SELECT s.PRDT_DATE , s.WORK_TYPE , s.EQP_ID , s.AREA , info.KIND , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM hanadmin.common_code WHERE CODE_GROUP = 'product_kind' and CODE = info.KIND) AS KIND_NM , info.PROD_NM , info.PROD_DTL_NM , s.PROD_ID , s.UPH , s.ST_TIME , s.ED_TIME , TRUNC((TO_DATE(s.ED_TIME, 'HH24:MI') - TO_DATE(s.ST_TIME, 'HH24:MI')) * 24 * 60, 2) WORK_TIME , s.PRDT_CNT , s.FAULTY_CNT , s.FINISHED_CNT , ROUND((s.FINISHED_CNT / s.PRDT_CNT) * 100, 2) || '%' CMPLT_PER , u.BOM_ID FROM HANADMIN.PRDT_STATUS_PROD s, HANADMIN.PRDT_INFO info, HANADMIN.MTRLS_USAGE u WHERE s.PROD_ID = info.PROD_ID AND s.PRDT_DATE = u.PRDT_DATE(+) AND s.WORK_TYPE = u.WORK_TYPE(+) AND s.EQP_ID = u.EQP_ID(+) AND s.AREA = u.AREA(+) AND s.PROD_ID = u.PROD_ID(+)
